info.title:
Discover
Villa Los Reyes
info.description: Welcome to Villa Los Reyes in Viñales. With over 20 years of experience, we offer hotel and extra-hotel services tailored to your needs. We are dedicated to ensuring your maximum comfort, guaranteeing you enjoy an eco-friendly resort with 24-hour electricity. Come and enjoy a unique experience in an incomparable setting.

mainHeader.title: Discover Villa Los Reyes
mainHeader.description: Explore our guesthouse with over 20 years of experience

location.title: Privileged Location
location.description: Located in a privileged environment, Villa Los Reyes is in the picturesque town of Viñales, offering easy and quick access to all local attractions while enjoying the tranquility and natural beauty of the region.

nature.title: Natural Beauty
nature.description: At Villa Los Reyes, in addition to finding a place to rest, you can enjoy a variety of experiences and adventures. We offer eco-activities guided by local experts, allowing you to explore the natural and cultural beauty of Viñales, from walking, horseback riding, car and bicycle tours to visits to tobacco plantations and caves.

comfort.title: Comfort
comfort.description: Villa Los Reyes is a private eco-friendly resort with modern construction, equipped with solar panels to ensure 24-hour electricity. It offers five comfortable rooms, a restaurant with local and international dishes, and a bar with exquisite Cuban cocktails. There is also a perfect pool for hot days and wheelchair accessibility. From its terraces, enjoy a majestic view of the mogotes, completing a unique experience of comfort and nature.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are proud to say our villa is sustainable, as the electricity we use is managed via solar panels, contributing to environmental care. Additionally, we have implemented recycling and water-efficient practices, ensuring every aspect of our operation minimizes ecological impact and promotes a greener, healthier future.

sections.title: Discover our facilities
sections.description: We offer a unique experience with our independent rooms, providing privacy and comfort. Enjoy panoramic views from our terraces, perfect for relaxing. Stroll through our lush gardens and immerse yourself in the tranquility of nature. Additionally, we have a refreshing pool for your enjoyment. Come and experience an unforgettable stay.

sections.title: Discover our services
sections.description: Enjoy delicious Cuban cuisine prepared by local chefs, transportation to explore the region, and assistance from our travel manager to make the most of your stay. Additionally, we provide laundry service, relaxing massages to recharge your energy, and dance classes to immerse yourself in Cuban culture.

header.title: Our Services
header.description: Discover services that will make your stay an unforgettable experience.

sections.title: Gastronomy
sections.description: In our restaurant and bar, enjoy authentic Cuban food alongside vegetarian, Italian, and Mediterranean options. We offer meals from breakfast to dinner, with snacks and takeaways if you are on the move. Don't miss our Cuban cocktails, each drink reflecting the authentic taste of Cuba. Come and savor the best of our cuisine!
